metadata.title: CVE-2024-42845 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An eval Injection vulnerability in the component invesalius/reader/dicom.pyof InVesalius 3.1.99991 through 3.1.99998 allows attackers to executearbitrary code via loading a crafted DICOM file.

criterions.comment: invesalius package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
